text: Deadfall is a 1968 British crime movie directed by Bryan Forbes and was based on the 1965 novel of the same name by Desmond Cory. It stars Michael Caine, Vladek Sheybal, Emilio Rodr√≠guez, David Buck, Eric Portman, Nanette Newman, Leonard Rossiter and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1968 crime movies Category:1968 LGBT movies Category:British crime movies Category:British LGBT movies Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Bryan Forbes
title: Deadfall (1968 movie)
